sentence.Network_en: Hamlet was played by Romania's leading actor, Ion Caramitrou, to rapturous acclaim.

sentence.Network_en: He played the title role in'Hamlet '.

商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... village 村 hamlet 小村 hole,dump 狭小破旧的住房.

list.abs: a village in Beiliu Town , Yangcheng County . it is also an ancient hamlet with 40 houses of the Ming dynasty .位于阳城县北留镇，毗邻皇城村，是个古老的村落，现存明代民居40院。
a hamlet may or may not have a church ., 村子也许有也许没有教堂.
a hamlet may have only a few houses .一个村子也许只要几间房子。
In the ancient China , hermits usually lived in hamlets ., 在古代中国 , 隐士们通常都住在小村子里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French hamelet, diminutive of hamel 'little village'; related to home (hám in Old English)

encyclopedia.content: 瑞典研究人员表示在母乳中发现一种物质能够杀死癌细胞。这种被称之为“Hamlet”的物质已成功在人体上进行测试，这在历史上还是第一次。每一次接受治疗后，使用Hamlet的膀胱癌患者能够将死亡的癌细胞通过尿液排出体外。也就是说，Hamlet能够成为一种潜在的治疗手段。

entry.def: A hamlet is a very small village.

means.word_mean: 1. a community of people smaller than a village
2. a settlement smaller than a town

sentences.en: The hamlet had been burned to the ground.
sentences.cn: 这座村落已完全被烧光了。

sentences.en: It was easy to believe that the tiny hamlet held some great mystery.
sentences.cn: 很容易让人相信这个小村庄藏着重大谜团。

sentences.en: In the ancient China,hermits usually lived in hamlets.
sentences.cn: 在古代中国,隐士们通常都住在小村子里。
